programme.title: Wildest Africa: Okavango: Water in the Desert

programme.title: Wildest India: Thar Desert: Sacred Sands
programme.desc: Covering 200,000 km sq, India's Thar desert is one of the harshest places on Earth. Desiccating winds and near permanent drought has earned this unforgiving land another name: the region of death.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Vancouver Island: Rivers of Life
programme.desc: Vancouver island is the largest island off the west coast of North America. Glaciers fuel the flow of some of Canada's tallest waterfalls, and an endless network of rivers and creeks provides the ideal habitat for the pacific salmon.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: Galapagos: Darwin's Eden

programme.title: Wildest Islands: The Hebrides: Land of Legends

programme.desc: Tonight, it is Queensland’s turn as butchers and good mates Artie & Johnny devise and prepare their own three-course menu. There will be thrills and spills as they battle the clock and their nerves to plate up on time.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 2
programme.desc: Tonight, we travel to Victoria to see housemates Kane & Lee devise and prepare their own three-course menu. There will be thrills and spills as they battle the clock and their nerves to plate up on time.

programme.title: My Kitchen Rules Australia: Episode 3
programme.desc: Tonight, we travel to NSW to see sisters SAMMY & BELLA devise and prepare their own three-course menu. There will be thrills and spills as they battle the clock and their nerves to plate up on time.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Grave Secrets
programme.desc: Killers often attempt to deflect attention away from their crimes by hiding the remains of their victims. Bodies may lay hidden for years before they are discovered.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Written In Blood
programme.desc: In North Carolina, the home of a prominent couple becomes an unlikely scene of terrible bloodshed. Across the country, a California woman vanishes, worrying her family and the investigators trying to find her.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Cold Blooded
programme.desc: Time of death is an important consideration in a murder investigation, but when a killer freezes, burns, or grinds his victim, even the most skilled medical examiner would be at a loss about how to calculate it.

programme.title: The New Detectives: A Deadly Smile
programme.desc: Investigators rely on forensic odontology to identify a body from a single tooth and to catch two brutal killers from their bite marks.

programme.title: The New Detectives: Natural Witness
programme.desc: The Great Outdoors may offer great clues to solving brutal murders. But it takes the keen eye of the forensic entomologist and botanist to decipher the clues nature provides.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: This season's contestants head to Las Vegas where they participate in the signature dish challenge; the winners of the challenge ride on the world's tallest Ferris wheel while the losers peel 50 pounds of shrimp and 1,000 pounds of potatoes.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The teams have 20 minutes to see which team can produce the most shrimp dumplings; rapper The Game attends the dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The chefs are given a communication challenge. VIP guests for dinner service include astronaut Buzz Aldrin.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Kris Jenner and Dita Von Teese enjoy duck dishes as one team pulls off a near-perfect dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The winners of this week's challenge enjoy a wine blending experience, before a disastrous dinner service leads to a shock departure.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel looks back on the Best Builds of season 1

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel hammers down on the best builds of season 2

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel is back at it, as one of his most eccentric clients throws down the challenge on a lead sled transformation

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel continues the Lead Sled Challened

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Master metal man Ian Roussel does the unthinkable with his wild show car

programme.title: Andromeda: The Lone and Level Sands
programme.desc: When the Andromeda is attacked by space pirates, they are rescued by a long-lost spaceship from Earth.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew discovers that a rogue planet, Marduk, has been creating weapons of mass destruction.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Leper's Kiss
programme.desc: A hitman by the name of the Leper is targeting the leaders of the New Commonwealth.

programme.title: Andromeda: For Whom the Bell Tolls
programme.desc: The Andromeda is haunted by a mysterious creature that comes aboard during a solar storm.

programme.title: Andromeda: And Your Heart Will Fly Away
programme.desc: When a long lost love returns, Tyr disappears from the ship to protect her from an assassin.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Girl in The Ditch
programme.desc: When 12 year old Agnes Ali'iva'a drowned in a ditch in 1992, the police initially thought her death was accidental. It was four years before public and political pressure forced police to re-investigate her death.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: Our new team of “ Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to unmask the killer – or killers – of vivacious New Zealand hairdresser Paula Brown who was plucked from Sydney’s downtown after a night out with friends.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Walk of Innocence
programme.desc: In 1970, eighteen-year-old Olive Waiker disappeared as she walked across Rotorua to babysit her nieces and nephews. Her semi-naked body was found hours later in a rest area south of the city..

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Without Warning
programme.desc: This week’s episode of Sensing Murder promises greater co-operation between psychics and police, attempting to uncover the truth about the death of 18-year-old apprentice plumber Regan O’Donoghue, who was killed in a hit and run in 2007.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Looking for Justice
programme.desc: This week, for the first time ever, the prime suspect in a murder enquiry has turned to Sensing Murder for help.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Ivan Milat: The Backpacker Murders
programme.desc: The backpacker murder case in the Belanglo State Forest, south west of Sydney, has entered Australian criminal folklore.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Predator: Leonard John Fraser
programme.desc: Serial killer Leonard Fraser was suspected of killing at least five women over a 17 year period but took the complete truth about his life of crime to his grave.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Greenough Family Massacre
programme.desc: The small hamlet of Greenough, near Geraldton in Western Australia, some 400 kilometres north of Perth, will forever be associated with one the most horrific murders in Australian criminal history.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Date With a Serial Killer: Rodney Cameron
programme.desc: Rodney Francis Cameron was dubbed ‘The Lonely Hearts Killer’ after he used a radio match-making program in 1990 to lure an unsuspecting woman to her death. Incredibly, he had only just been released from prison for two other killings in 1974.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Snowtown: Bodies in the Barrels
programme.desc: In 1999, eight bodies are found in six barrels filled with acid in a former bank vault in rural Snowtown, 50 kilometres north of Adelaide.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Sins of a Father
programme.desc: Stevie and Alex work together to trap a cattle thief with inside knowledge. Tess’s life is turned upside down when Nick learns he has a deadly heart condition.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Boy Made Good
programme.desc: Stevie’s past catches up with her when her daughter’s father arrives unexpectedly in Gungellan. Jodi uncovers a bizarre secret about Stevie’s former lover.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Pearl
programme.desc: Jodi risks everything to help Luke, when she learns he has been blackmailed by a criminal gang.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Prodigal Daughter
programme.desc: Tess’s mysterious cousin, Regan, makes instant enemies when she visits Drovers Run. Stevie must rely on Regan’s help to escape a life-threatening farm accident.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Love and Obsession
programme.desc: As Dave and Regan fall for each other, Kate realises Regan has a secret she’ll do anything to protect.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Boss Terry Davis has been with Home Hardware Stores for 42 years. He worked his way up to the top – now he’s returning to the shop floors and factories to turn flaws into fixes.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dina Dwyer-Owens, the Chairwoman and CEO of The Dwyer Group, which is the parent company to a collection of franchise brands specializing in home and vehicle maintenance, goes undercover posing as a contestant on a show called Keep Your Day Job.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Home Is Where the Haunt Is
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, Taps heads to Beardslee Castle in Little Falls, NY, which is a hometurned into a restaurant/ bar that has lots of interesting claims.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Public Poltergeist Number 1
programme.desc: The historic Old Lake County Jail was once considered to be inescapable... until notorious gangster John Dillinger, escaped from it in 1934. Over 80 years later, aggressive prisoners are breaking free as sealed areas.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Flooded Souls
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Hales Bar Dam and Marina in Tennessee, to investigate a dam that was built on Native American land.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Overdue For Death
programme.desc: Newly designated as a \\"Literary Landmark,\\" this library is consumed with ghostly visitors with a thirst for knowledge.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A Family Affair
programme.desc: Dog likes to say, "The apple doesn't fall far from the tree," and this is a hunt where that is true. So will Dog be able to use one family member's troubled ways to catch another one in trouble with the law?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Training Day
programme.desc: While the team tries to handle the bond that newcomer Alysin wrote incorrectly, sparks are flying between Beth and Duane Lee when he questions Beth's decision to go on the hunt without Dog leading the charge!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cutting the Apron Strings
programme.desc: Two different young men both have a bad habit of missing their court dates. Looking over their files Dog senses that they have another trait in common, both are a little too tied to their mothers.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Short Handed
programme.desc: Dog's target today has a history of violence, and apparently plans to re-locate without notifying the proper authorities. Unfortunately the team is missing a key player, Duane Lee is MIA today distracted by his new lady love.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Photo Op
programme.desc: Dog and Duane Lee can't agree about what role Duane Lee should have in the family business. But the family comes together as they set out to hunt a chronic violator with an open warrant and a wife who has an odd request for Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A House Divided
programme.desc: Dog has dropped Duane Lee from the team. When Leland confronts Dog and Beth about the decision tempers flare. But they have to come together to answer a cry for help from a mother who feels that the safest place for her daughter is jail.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All Grown Up
programme.desc: Cecily has graduated from High School and Dog believes the time is right to show her what the family business is all about. The rough and tumble world of bounty hunting is very different than the all girls private school she attended.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fight Like A Girl
programme.desc: This one is close to home. Dog's target on today's hunt is the cousin of Kali, Garry Boy's caregiver. In addition, she has a reputation as a brawler. With Duane Lee still missing from the team Baby Lyssa decides she will step-up in this hunt.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Higher Power
programme.desc: In an attempt to bring the team back together, Dog recruits his pastor, Tim Storey, to be the peacemaker. As Dog begins his hunt for a young man who has trouble showing up at court, Tim has his own mission - convince Duane Lee to meet with him.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drag Me To Glory
programme.desc: When NASCAR sensation Clint Bowyer pays a visit to the Duck Commander warehouse, Willie and the guys are fired up to spend the day hanging out with the professional racecar driver.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Season Eve
programme.desc: Tomorrow is the opening day of Duck Season and the men are carrying on their tradition of camping on the Robertson Land the night before.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Can't Hardly Weight
programme.desc: Gearing up for his high school reunion, Willie realizes that he could stand to lose a few pounds. Jase and Korie set out to help him drop some weight and the strenuous battle of man-versus-waistline begins.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Shot Thru The Heart
programme.desc: The guys learn from Willie that John Luke is going through his first break up. In order to make him feel better the men decide to take John Luke hunting for nutria, and impart their relationship wisdom.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Here Lizard, Lizard
programme.desc: When the warehouse guys new office pet (a lizard) escapes, they try all they can in order to catch the wily reptile. Proving impossible, the guys finally decide to bring in the big guns to help trap it--Mr. Phil Robertson.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hallu-Si-Nations
programme.desc: With Willie out-of-town, the guys decide to flake off work and leave to brush up the duck blinds on the Robertson land. While out, Si believes he spots what he thinks is the infamous 'Black Panther'.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Let's Go Hunting, Deer
programme.desc: Willie and Jase invite Korie and Missy along on a deer hunt because they believe their wives have become too "city." At Phil and Kay's, Miss Kay decides she wants to frame Phil's original blueprints from the first duck call he created.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Tickets To The Fun Show
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room. The massage chair becomes a detriment to the workflow, so Willie takes Si around for a replacement prize.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Be a Lady
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ring Around the Redneck
programme.desc: Though Jase lost his wedding ring long ago, Missy decides it's time for Jase to replace it with a new one. When Jase is duck hunting, once again, he loses the ring.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bass Man Standing
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team is invited to unveil a wing of the local Bass Pro shop that will feature their products.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler SAR searches for two military pilots who crashed a T-33 jet in the Callaghan Valley. But there’s a catch… the pilots have been missing for over 50 years.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR enlists bystanders to help rescue an injured man perched on a log in the middle of a raging river.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Kent Harrison SAR works into the night to locate and extricate a paraglider hanging 30 metres up a tree in the forest.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR teams say goodbye to fallen SAR member Sheilah Sweatman.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Fifty SAR members from Princeton and Penticton SAR search for an elderly woman who disappeared.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Bears converge on an injured tree faller alone in the wilderness as Nelson SAR races to the scene.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Kent Harrison uses high tech sonar to help RCMP search for a missing camper.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: A snowmobiler trapped 30 metres down an icy crevasse says goodbye to his wife and family.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR team up with a local psychic to find a missing person.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Rossland SAR employs high tech and local knowledge to search for missing skiers.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler SAR is on a mountain mission for missing friends who failed to show up for a landmark birthday party.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Family Guy
programme.desc: Jazmin's final straw was when Darren brought another woman over and lied about Jazmin being his sister and his daughter being his niece. Darren feels he's a good father who pays the bills and doesn't need to answer to anyone if he's not married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Punisher
programme.desc: Shea says Jessica constantly punishes him due her history of cheating exes. She must know where Shea is every second forcing his friends to cut ties. Jessica has caught Shea lying to her in the past. Can Judge Lynn Toler get them on track?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Thin Line Between Love and Hate
programme.desc: When the going got tough, Dermartess left his children and Rofiesha. Dermartess says Rofiesha forced him to leave 7 years ago. He still loves her and wants to see his children but believes she was too toxic. Can Judge Lynn Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Enough Is Enough
programme.desc: Dwight has had it with Roxy's mental abuse. Dwight says Roxy has cost him multiple jobs because she's constantly harassing him at work, but she says he needs to give her the attention she deserves! Can Judge Toler help them see eye to eye?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Sick and Tired
programme.desc: Timothy is tired of being kicked out the house every time Erin catches an attitude. If she kicks him out once more, he's gone for good. Erin says she dropped out of college and left behind a full tennis scholarship because of him.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Heart Break Hotel
programme.desc: Brianna says Steven constantly looks at other women behind her back which has taken a toll on her confidence. He says her overprotectiveness leads to arguments that end up with her accusing him of cheating.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Tapped Out
programme.desc: Lataisha says Chris smokes weed all day and can’t keep a job. Things seemed to be going fine until one day she walked downstairs in their home and realized that Chris moved out. Chris says he left because she is too aggressive.

programme.title: Divorce Court: In My Feelings
programme.desc: Raymond, also known as @IamRollingRay, is an Instagram sensation who says his high school sweetheart is jealous of his social media fan base. Christian thinks Ray shows more attention to his fanbase, accusing him of cheating with his followers.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Caught Up
programme.desc: Syncere says Mark has lied and disrespected her on several occasions and she’s not going to stand for it anymore. Mark says he cheats on Syncere because she has a bad attitude and she gets on his nerves.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 1
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 2
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lesbihonest
programme.desc: Porcha has had enough of Ivory's promiscuous behavior. He claims Porcha has more tricks and secrets than Houdini and her lying has taken its toll. Can Judge Lynn Toler help this couple or is it time for Cupid to take better aiming lessons?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: All in the Family
programme.desc: Dog and the team need to help Leland hunt down some elusive fugitives. The case is a family affair with both mother and daughter in trouble with the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Day of the Dog
programme.desc: Dog and the team are back in Colorado hunting bounties. Today's fugitive has a long rap sheet and a reputation for packing heat. With nothing but an address and phone number, the team heads out on the hunt.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Call Waiting
programme.desc: Dog's target for today has been in trouble with the law since he was a juvenile. And he seems willing to use any trick in the system to avoid capture by Dog. In this match of wits, will Dog prevail?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A House Divided
programme.desc: Dog has dropped Duane Lee from the team. When Leland confronts Dog and Beth about the decision tempers flare. But they have to come together to answer a cry for help from a mother who feels that the safest place for her daughter is jail.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Run Fugitive, Run
programme.desc: When the team hunts for Steven, a fugitive with a history of domestic abuse, they seek help from his girlfriend, who's been a victim of his abuse. Meanwhile, Beth trains for a 5K race to help raise awareness about domestic abuse.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: What do you do when you have a fugitive you not only want to find, but believe can be helped back onto the straight and narrow? If you're Mary Ellen you call your good friend Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tent City
programme.desc: Today's hunt takes Dog far from the glittering hotels of Waikiki to the parts of Hawaii tourist rarely see, Oahu's ramshackle tent cities. The team searches for a woman who has lost almost everything, her home, her family and her spirit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Island, Small Town
programme.desc: Dog has problems when he goes to a small town on the Big Island of Hawaii to track down a fugitive. In a small town, everyone knows everyone else's business, making it impossible for Dog to hunt in secret.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cap and Gown
programme.desc: Friend of the family, Kili, is joining the team to help track down a runner on the Hawaiian island of Maui. This is not the only thing on their schedule, because after the hunt, Kili has to hurry off to his college graduation ceremony!

programme.title: Girlfriends: A Comedy of Eros
programme.desc: Valentine’s Day finds Toni meddling in Joan’s love life, and William hoping to make a date with destiny

programme.title: Girlfriends: Leggo My Ego
programme.desc: Toni’s obsessed with meeting supermodel Beverly Johnson.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Good Catch or a Bad Hop?
programme.desc: Maya fears her major-league beau is a real player.

programme.title: Girlfriends: On the Couch
programme.desc: Toni must choose between her husband and her mother.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Love, Peace & Hair Grease
programme.desc: Joan’s in for a big surprise when she contemplates quitting her job

programme.title: Girlfriends: Wieners and Losers
programme.desc: After quitting the law firm, Joan goes from the courtrooms to food courts.

programme.title: Girlfriends: He Loves Her, He Loves Me Not
programme.desc: William’s new girlfriend claims he is in love with Joan.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The My First Job Episode
programme.desc: Lindsey gets her first job at a fast food restaurant, but soon gets fired when she gives out free food.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Tiger Dad Episode
programme.desc: Nick tries to become a more effective parent, so he pushes Kevin and Lindsey to become better people.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Expensive Purse Episode
programme.desc: Against Nick's wishes, Suzanne buys an expensive purse and Nick becomes suspicious about it, so he uses her guilt to his advantage.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Master of Ceremonies Episode
programme.desc: Suzanne becomes the subject to Nick's joke-off, and Suzanne retaliates against him.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Spirits of the Slave Dungeon
programme.desc: Ryan books a two-night case in a real haunted jail in Charleston, SC, but PRS soon realizes the spirits themselves are being held there against their will and subjected to an unjust form of torture.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Name
programme.desc: Ryan Buell and company set out on one of their most dangerous cases to date - to help a single mother who is experiencing paranormal activity in a home that was once the site of brutal murder.

programme.title: Paranormal State: School House Haunting
programme.desc: PRS travels to Massachusetts to investigate an old schoolhouse where children's voices disturb a couple who've made it their home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Bedroom Eyes
programme.desc: PRS travels to rural Pennsylvania to investigate a haunting that began after a new couple moved into an old family farm.?Over the next three days, hidden tragedies are uncovered and latent psychic abilities are revealed.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Lady Vampire

programme.title: Paranormal State: Church of the Damned

programme.title: Paranormal State: Pet Cemetery
programme.desc: Ryan and his team investigate the bizarre haunting of a woman and her dog in Waterboro, Maine. The Labrador was chewing at her own fur and standing on guard on the bed, growling at unseen figures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Knickerbocker
programme.desc: PRS checks into the Knickerbocker Hotel in Linesville, Pennsylvania where the owners are reporting strange noises and the appearance of phantom children in some of the rooms.

programme.title: Paranormal State: They Only Come Out at Night
programme.desc: Once night falls in a quaint?New England Town, a police officer's family is terrorized by demons.?PRS arrives just in time with the family ready to vacate their family home, rather than suffer the advances of these spirit creatures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Sex Dungeon
programme.desc: Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey and Chad Calek join PRS for this unusual case of a sprawling mansion on Greyhaven Island near Detroit. Ken, the owner, hears voices and banging and it has him feeling both watched and cursed; a prisoner in his own home.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Haden Hill House Part 2

programme.title: Most Haunted: Keithley Bus Museum

programme.title: Most Haunted: Rowleys House

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Fleece Inn

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Judges Lodgings Part 2

programme.desc: On the witness stand Steven testifies he saw Alexis push Mark to his death. Jeff sees other women in an attempt to forget Fallon, but remains obsessed with his ex-wife. Alexis takes the stand and testifies.

programme.title: Dynasty: Amanda
programme.desc: Adam and Dex vow to prove Alexis' innocence and begin a determined campaign. The woman who testified she had seen Alexis on the terrace with Mark had hosted a party that evening and snapped photographs.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.98
programme.desc: Woman alleges ex threatened son's jail over Subaru. Intoxicated men, post cage fighting, cause injuries, lawsuits.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.243
programme.desc: A young woman and her father sue her ex-boyfriend, arrested for unpaid child support, for bail money and security deposit return. Another woman, 20, sues her ex for totaling her 2006 Ford Focus; he countersues for unpaid rent and a stolen passport.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.216
programme.desc: A bar patron, who was beaten up and knocked out, blames the bar co-owner for putting him in danger after he was ejected from his establishment. Brother sues brother over missed payments on a Ford Crown Victoria.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.122
programme.desc: Woman and niece sue niece's ex-friend over wrecked Jeep Commander/injured woman sues for nude photos posted online/woman sues estranged daughter-in-law for loan to recover repossessed car.

programme.desc: A teenager refuses to take a drug test after denying charges that he smashed a car window and stole a neighbor’s belongings/A female nail technician sues a cosmetologist for money allegedly paid toward an apprenticeship.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.84

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.214
programme.desc: A man's parole is at risk due to possession charges. He's sued for jail calls and accused of selling fake jewelry. A man sues his niece's friend for allegedly damaging his car at a party.

programme.desc: Teenagers steal car, vandalize junkyard; one pleads guilty, demands co-conspirator pay $15,000 fine/Woman sues ex for loan balance; he countersues for harassment/Woman seeks compensation for testifying against son's ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.139
programme.desc: Ex accuses ex-boyfriend of car theft; new boyfriend helps buy new car. Roommates feud over tattoos, skydiving, and family illness expenses.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.52
programme.desc: A woman sues her daughter’s schoolmate and her teen goddaughter for damages to her property and an ambulance bill, resulting from an assault.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.171
programme.desc: Teen sustains broken eye socket in black sweatshirt altercation; accused claims self-defense. Man aids son with financial aid post-back injury, demands repayment.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.127
programme.desc: 11-year-old girl accused of pouring scalding water on 5-year-old boy; mothers fight over liability and medical expenses/A man sues horse trainer for saddle return; granddaughter sold it.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Water Adventures
programme.desc: We are captivated by oceans, rivers, and lakes - the power, the flow, the reflective stillness. And as we seek to get closer, we immerse ourselves in an expanding range of aquatic experiences.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Glaciers
programme.desc: Clinging to the world’s highest mountains and forming ice caps on both poles, glaciers leave an impression on the landscape and on all who bear witness to their splendor.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Treks
programme.desc: Every journey made by foot promises a grand adventure. From the highest mountains to the wildest jungle realms, treks venture down the road less travelled, allowing us to connect to nature, history, and culture, one step at a time.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Ancient Cities
programme.desc: In Ancient Cities, we journey to these ancestors of influence such as Luang Prabang, Vienna, and Istanbul where religious and cultural centers have shaped the ways in which we view the world around us and continue to do so in modern times.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Bridges
programme.desc: A bridge is a structure that’s designed to transcend, but a great bridge can define the place where it stands. Symbols of human ingenuity, beauty, and grandeur, bridges connect us not only to each other but also to the past.

programme.title: Arthur: The Cherry Tree/Matchmaker Matchbreaker
programme.desc: Muffy wants a Bouncy Castle at her party, but when her favorite cherry tree is cut down to make room for it, she starts to have regrets. Francine and Muffy scheme to set up their older siblings Chip and Catherine, but plans go awry.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W., All Fired Up/I'd Rather Read It Myself
programme.desc: When Ms. Morgan announces they'll be having a fire drill during preschool, D.W. wants no part of it--it sounds way too scary. Then, the Tibble Twins are better than D.W. at just about everything.

programme.title: Arthur: The Pea and the Princess/D.W. and Dr. Whosit
programme.desc: The 3rd grade class is putting on a production of “The Princess and the Pea,” and Prunella is at the helm as director! Then, Mom and Dad tell D.W. she’s too young to watch a new television show that everyone is talking about.

programme.title: Arthur: Speak Up Francine/Waiting for Snow
programme.desc: The local creek is polluted and pesticide run-off is to blame. Francine is determined to get the word out at the annual Earth Day rally. Ladonna can't wait to experience her first blizzard, if only the weather would cooperate.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Weighs In/The Law of the Jungle Gym
programme.desc: When Arthur doesn't fit into his costume for the play, he's shocked to learn that he's gotten "husky-sized." He gets serious about getting in shape. Muffy found the perfect place to take pictures with her new digital camera: the jungle gym.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's First Sleepover/Arthur's New Year's Eve
programme.desc: Have you ever been afraid of the dark? Despite D.W.'s threat of aliens, Arthur sets his tent for his first sleepover. Then, what exactly happens at midnight, December 31st? There are plenty of rumors, but no one seems to know for sure.

programme.title: Arthur: Brain's Brain/Brain Sees Stars
programme.desc: Brain's Easter egg hunts are notoriously hard. But this year's might prove impossible if Brain can't remember where he hid the final egg. Then, crazy coincidences have prevented Brain from seeing a meteor shower in person.

programme.title: Arthur: The Case of the Girl with the Long Face/The Substitute Arthur
programme.desc: Fern's been feeling low and no one can figure out why. Luckily, Buster Baxter is on the case! With Arthur out of town, Buster is on the hunt for a new best friend, but he only wants to play games HIS way. Will Buster learn to compromise?

programme.title: Arthur: Fright Night/Citizen Cheikh
programme.desc: Buster’s Uncle Bob – portrayed by special guest R.L. Stine – comes to visit and tells Buster a spooky bedtime story. Then, Cheikh learns that he and his family will become American citizens!

programme.title: War Wrecks: The Untold Stories: The Lost Tanks of D-Day
programme.desc: In Normandy, June 6, 1944, a dozen Sherman tanks equipped with floats, the famous Duplex Drives (DD), leave their ship to swim to Omaha Beach... not all of them make it.

programme.title: The Rise of the Nazi Party
programme.desc: Hitler finds his political destiny in post-war Munich. He quickly dominates a fringe party & builds it into the Nazi Party. He recruits infamous men to the cause including Herman Goering & Heinrich Himmler & they plot a coup known as the Beerhall Putsch.

programme.title: The Rise of the Nazi Party
programme.desc: In 1924, Hitler is convicted for High Treason after the failed Nazi power grab. In prison, he writes Mein Kampf, articulating his anti-Semitic and expansionist beliefs. Upon release, Hitler rebrands the Nazi Party.

programme.title: The Rise of the Nazi Party
programme.desc: In 1930s Germany, Hitler capitalizes on economic woes blaming the Weimar Government and Jews. Despite scandals, Nazi rallies gain popularity and emerge as the largest party. Hitler becomes Chancellor in 1933, using the 'Enabling Act' to seize power.

programme.title: The Rise of the Nazi Party
programme.desc: Adolf Hitler's secret agenda is to rid Germany of Jews. By 1938, after creating work schemes and rearming, he orchestrates "The Night of Broken Glass," burning 1,000 synagogues and killing 91 Jews, preparing for further aggression.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Alayah & Tommy
programme.desc: Alayah and Tommy started messaging on a live streaming platform. Alayah thinks he could be the one, but when they try and meet, he keeps cancelling. Nella and Oobah help to track him down. (S2, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Steven & Samm
programme.desc: Steven is due to graduate high school, instead of planning for college he wants to move to California for his online love, Samm. Steven's mum is sceptical of Samm's identity. (S4, ep10)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Lauren & Derek
programme.desc: Lauren met Derek online years ago. Derek is caring, supporting Lauren after she had a baby with a former boyfriend. Lauren thinks Derek could be the one, so why has he avoided meeting her?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Robin is desperate to meet her hunky, long-distance love in person. Nev and Max agree to help her hunt him down, but what they uncover turns out to be much more than Robin bargained for! (S6, ep17)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Mike & Caroline
programme.desc: Mike fell in love with Caroline online. He grew suspicious when she continually evaded meeting him, yet left notes at his car. Is Caroline an imposter or is she just afraid?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Caitlyn calls on Nev and Max to help separate the fact from fiction of her courtship with Kenton. Kenton insists she and her daughter move to Kentucky but is Kenton all he claims to be? (S6, ep20)

programme.title: The Hills: A Change of Plans
programme.desc: Lauren has to face her boss after the party. Meanwhile, Heidi doesn't take school seriously and makes different plans for her future. (S1, ep2)

programme.title: The Hills: An Unexpected Call
programme.desc: Teen Vogue sends Lauren on an over-night errand that lands her in New York City, Heidi learns that work in party promotion isn't just a party, and Audrina looks to Brian for love. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: The Hills: Lauren and Jason: Part 2
programme.desc: When Jason, Lauren's ex flame from Laguna Beach, reappears in her life, Lauren thinks she may not be over him. Meanwhile, Heidi asks if the price of a new job is worth paying for. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: The Hills: Jason's Birthday
programme.desc: After a Teen Vogue event, Lauren hurries to get home to Jason for his birthday. However, things don't end up so well when Jason only wants to hang out with his friends. (S1, ep5)

programme.title: The Hills: Boyfriends and Work Don't Mix
programme.desc: Jason becomes a distraction in Lauren's life, Heidi finally gets her big chance to work in the nightclub, and when a model drops out from a Teen Vogue fashion show, Whitney steps in. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: The Hills: Somebody Always Has to Cry
programme.desc: It's the gang's first holiday in LA but not everyone gets what they wish for. A New Year's kiss is hard to come by for Lauren when Jason learns she got a call from an old flame. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: The Hills: You Can't Just Be With Me?
programme.desc: Jason wants to make Lauren's 20th birthday special, but when she lies to him about working with male models for a Teen Vogue assignment, their relationship is put to the test. (S1, ep8)

programme.title: The City: If She Can Make It Here...
programme.desc: Whitney arrives in New York City during fashion week just in time to start her new career with iconic designer, Diane Von Furstenberg. (S1, ep1)

programme.title: The City: The Truth Will Reveal Itself
programme.desc: Whitney's world is turned upside-down when a boy from her past shows up to warn her that Jay has been fooling around. Olivia decides that befriending Whitney is her new project. (S1, ep2)

programme.title: The City: The L Word
programme.desc: Whitney gets mixed signals from Jay and decides to ask him directly where she stands. Erin's new boyfriend comes to visit and Whitney realizes it's time to find her own apartment. (S1, ep3)

programme.title: The City: Good Things Come In Threes
programme.desc: Whitney dates a new guy and Jay confesses to Adam his true feelings about Whitney. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Crime and Punishment
programme.desc: Two women fight to keep the man convicted of killing their mother over 20 years earlier in prison, though he maintains his innocence.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder in the Fast Lane
programme.desc: A report on the March 1988 murder of legendary racecar driver Mickey Thompson and his wife Trudy. Thompson’s sister is convinced that Michael Goodwin, her brother’s former partner, was the killer.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: In 1986, 21-year-old Mitzi Nalley was brutally murdered in her Austin, Texas home. Police arrested Jonathan Wayne Nobles, who confessed to the crime and was sentenced to the death penalty.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Body of Lies
programme.desc: In 2006, 31-year-old Leisha Hurst, while attending Barstow College, began dating fellow student, 34-year-old Jeami Chiapulis. Chiapulis seemed to be the man she could settle down with. The couple had plans to marry when Hurst vanished on January 22, 2009

programme.title: 48 Hours: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: The investigation of the September 24, 1988 sexual torture-murder in Louisville, Kentucky, of Brenda Sue Schaefer.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Cabin Fever/U.S. Acres: Return of Power Pig/Fair Exchange
programme.desc: Garfield and Odie are snowbound in a cabin with no food./A monster circulates around the farm, Orson dons his "Power Pig" togs./Garfield dreams he changes places with Jon.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends

programme.desc: With quarters cramped in the cavern, Bumblebee and Fixit scout for a new living arrangement. Sideswipe and Strongarm venture out as well, and are trapped by Clampdown inside a shipping container.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: Prepare for Departure
programme.desc: Grimlock goofs off while on monitor duty and misses a signal alert at the Nuclear Waste Disposal site. The Bee Team still gets there in time to engage Steeljaw and his Pack, but are waylaid in a crevasse and the Decepticons get away with nuclear material.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: Prisoner Principles
programme.desc: When the BEE TEAM investigates a Decepticon signal near a nuclear power plant, they find QUILLFIRE and CLAMPDOWN. Quillfire escapes, but STRONGARM captures Clampdown. He reveals STEELJAW's plan to steal nuclear fuel rods from the power plant.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: Collateral Damage
programme.desc: Optimus Prime arrives to warn the Bee Team about a breach in the Shadow Zone.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: Something He Ate
programme.desc: The Bee Teamers return to the Scrapyard with their Decepticon captives, and find the place completely trashed. Sideswipe, Strongarm, and Grimlock balk at being assigned clean-up duty, asserting that they're warriors, not janitors.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: Sick as a Bot
programme.desc: The Autobots suffer serious malfunctions after the Decepticon WINGCODE exposes them to harmful nanoparticles in an attempt to get her claws on the team's stash of Energon Cubes.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: Five Fugitives
programme.desc: The Bee Team is about to catch their nemesis Steeljaw when they are interrupted by Strongarm's old mentor DROPFORGE, who arrives from Cybertron with orders to arrest them.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: Enemy of my Enemy
programme.desc: Unannounced, Optimus returns to the scrapyard with an All-Star team of Autobot allies: Ratchet, Windblade, and Jazz, as well as Drift and his Mini-Cons.

programme.title: Transformers: Robots in Disguise: Freedom Fighters
programme.desc: Surrounded and outgunned on Cybertron, the Bee Team and Steeljaw are in danger of seeing their mission to overthrow the oppressive High Council go up in smoke.

programme.title: Transformers: Animated: Transform And Roll Out! Part 1
programme.desc: The evil Decepticons have appeared in Detroit. With the all powerful Allspark, Megatron can use it to turn all of Earth's robots into Decepticons.

programme.title: Survivorman: Legend of Klemtu Hill
programme.desc: There's a volcano in British Columbia where Bigfoot reports are in the hundreds. According to locals, a mysterious animal leaves tracks and even kills people. Les braves the dangers of this Bigfoot hotspot to find the truth behind these strange reports.

programme.title: Survivorman: Where the Myth Began
programme.desc: Les tracks Bigfoot in the ancient red cedar forests of northwest California. This Sasquatch hotspot is renowned for reports of Bigfoot, and the forest is crawling with black bears. Will Les brave its dangers and catch Sasquatch on camera?

programme.title: Survivorman: Mystery of Bigfoot Mountain
programme.desc: Les ventures into the most remote and dangerous grizzly bear territory of the Canadian Rockies in his search for Sasquatch. In this vast and unexplored forest, anything could be out there. Can Les capture definitive proof of Bigfoot?

programme.title: Survivorman: Giants of the Forest
programme.desc: Les returns to the wilderness of remote Alberta to investigate evidence of Sasquatch activity. Armed with infrared camera and thermal imaging technology, Les investigates reports of Bigfoot sightings in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: Survivorman: Smoky Mountain Sasquatch
programme.desc: Les goes deep into the heart of Tennessee's Great Smoky Mountains in pursuit of Bigfoot. Encounters with an unknown creature have been reported in this black bear hotspot, and Les knows that where bears thrive, Sasquatch can thrive, too.

programme.title: Survivorman: Searching the Southwest
programme.desc: Les follows a trail from Texas to Utah in his quest to catch Bigfoot on camera. Locals report encounters in haunted mountains and spooky canyons, and Les applies scientific methods and his survival skills to lure the legend out of hiding.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: In 1993, an Amtrak train crashed, crossing Alabama's Bayou Canot bridge. Forty-seven passengers and crew were killed. Investigators hunt for clues as to the cause of the crash.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: When a fire erupted at King's Cross Underground, investigators were able to pinpoint the cause. Could they explain why it became a blazing inferno, killing 31 people?

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A discarded sleeping bag, containing bloody sneakers and a purse, leads police to the body of a young woman. The autopsy and crime scene were analysed, but it would be a mark found on the victim's body that would enable police to track the killer.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A woman is killed while walking her dogs in the woods. She has no enemies and her husband has an alibi, so police assume it was a hunting accident until a strange letter turns up, allegedly written by the woman before her death.

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: The discovery of vital evidence, more than 2,000 miles away from a murder victim's body, helps detectives piece together the case.

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Tonbo!

programme.title: Tonbo!

programme.desc: Bob and the gang are replacing some old pipes outside the town hall. Molly, meanwhile, is practicing for her first aid exam with a reluctant JJ as guinea pig. When Wendy calls JJ’s yard to order a special pipe and Molly offers to deliver it.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is tiling a roof and calls at JJ’s yard to pick up the materials. But there is only one pallet of the requisite red tiles in stock, so JJ promises to send the remainder of the order as soon as his delivery arrives.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: The Omagh Bombing

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip

programme.desc: Cole and Abbie keep being sent anonymous creepy gifts to their home and their relationship is now at breaking point. Julie and Oobah head to Scotland to try and help save their marriage. (S1, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Levi & Will

programme.title: Catfish UK: Emma & Harlin

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder in the Fast Lane

programme.title: 48 Hours: Crime and Punishment

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Long Island Serial Killer
programme.desc: A report on the disappearance of Shannan Gilbert, near Gilgo Beach, New York. The search for Shannan led to the discovery of a total of ten bodies in the scrub brush of Gilgo Beach, leading police to suspect the work of a serial killer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Secrets, Lies and Alibis
programme.desc: John and Susan Sutton were sleeping in separate rooms in their Florida home, when a gunman entered their house and shot both of them several times. Susan was killed, but John survived. Nothing was taken from the house, proving the murder premeditated.

programme.title: 48 Hours: To Catch a Stalker
